creditline: The Richard and Beverly Fink Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: abstracted image; vertical insect "body" with six irregular red football shapes vertically along back; grey hatched elements at left and right; two pairs of green leaflike elements and three red leaflike elements in top corners; pink vertical wavy lines at left and right in lower quadrants; yellow in background at top; touch of blue at top center; received in white frame

title: Untitled (Moth)
